mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ExclusionperiodHistory WHERE id = #{id} AND stock_code1 IS NOT NULL AND stock_code2 IS NOT NULL AND stock_code3 IS NOT NULL
SELECT ad.name FROM ( SELECT ad.name, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ExclusionperiodHistory su JOIN AvailableData ad ON su.stock_code1 = ad.stock_code WHERE su.stock_code1 = #{stock_code1} ) ad WHERE rn = 1
SELECT ad.name FROM ( SELECT ad.name, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ExclusionperiodHistory su JOIN AvailableData ad ON su.stock_code2 = ad.stock_code WHERE su.stock_code2 = #{stock_code2} ) ad WHERE rn = 1
SELECT ad.name FROM ( SELECT ad.name, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ExclusionperiodHistory su JOIN AvailableData ad ON su.stock_code3 = ad.stock_code WHERE su.stock_code3 = #{stock_code} ) ad WHERE rn = 1
